description: Turn a simple smoothie into a nourishing breakfast bowl with the addition of blueberries, raspberries, nuts, seeds and chiaseeds.
name: Super Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small banana, peeled, sliced, and frozen
2 medium papaya, peeled, deseeded, roughly chopped, and frozen

recipeInstructions.text: Simply place all the main ingredients in a blender and process until smooth and thick, adding a little extra almond milk if necessary.
Transfer the smoothie to a bowl and decorate with the superfood toppings. Sweeten the smoothie with a drizzle of honey, if needed.
